title: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program for Fostering Critical Thinking in Elementary Science

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science knowledge and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Accessibility-focused design using smartphones and LMS for current elementary education practitioners. Aims to apply critical thinking in science problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners structure problem-solving processes by applying explicit computational thinking (CT) strategies during science experiment design
Learners engage in critical discussions and feedback exchanges with peers using digital collaboration tools (smartphone-compatible)
Learners generate at least three question frameworks for evaluating the credibility of scientific information sources
Learners develop protocols to resolve science-related problems in real educational settings using comparative analysis approaches

resources: Open-Source Collaboration Tools (Padlet/Google Docs Mobile Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
